text: (He wong kang padha nyekel bebeneran), menawa sira padha kuwatir (weruh) pasulayaning wong bebojoan nuli sira padha nganakna juru pemisah , saka sadulure kang lanang lan sijine saka sanake kang wadon . Sabanjure menawa juru pemisah loro-loro mau karep gawe becik, Allah bakal nulungi antarane wong loro mau. Satemene Allah Maha Ngudaneni sarta Maha Waspada
